work_1.name: 采矿技术

inv_1.desc: 这个炉民已经装备了能额外装多2块矿石的背包.

speed_1.name: 急速
speed_1.desc: 这个矿工不想浪费任何时间.移动速度+10.

work_2.desc: 挖石头就好像刷牙一样简单.开采效率提升.

speed_2.name: 效率
speed_2.desc: Rocks and loose soil are second nature to this miner. Speed increased by 15.

light.name: 发光!
light.desc: 你的矿工发现了一块很耀眼的石头并装饰在帽子上.

info.name: 矿工
info.desc: 挖矿与运送的专业级工具.

master_pick.desc: The solid-gold weight on this axe makes it cut through rock like a fish through water

master_pick_recipe.name: 大师镐

load_metal.description: Forge your town's future with the earth's riches. Harden your soldiers with fire and steel. When you have the earth, do you really need anything else?
load_metal.tooltip: 快速发展你的城镇的金属工业和军事力量.
